subject: Sexual Health
title: Donor Gametes
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Donor Gametes.

hook.text: When a person cannot produce viable eggs or sperm, donor gametes offer a path to parenthood.

buildup.text: Sperm donation is straightforward and widely available. Egg donation requires stimulation and retrieval.

discovery.text: Donors are screened for genetic diseases, infections, and medical history before being accepted.

twist.text: Many donor-conceived people seek information about their biological origins, prompting shifts toward open donation.

climax.text: Donor gametes have helped millions build families that biology alone could not create.

punchline.text: Biology is one path. Generosity opens another.

quiz.question: What trend is emerging in gamete donation?
options: A shift toward open or known donation
